name: Saccharine (Waffle Iron Studios)
description:
It's Christmas Eve in the Great North, and Private Detective Sanya K. Waffles is on her way to visit her friends. While taking a break from the open road, a truck stop has been overran by holly jolly denizens that are as festive as they are ruthless. And it's gone beyond the truck stop - the entire country is under siege. Certainly the work of that terrorist cell you've been trying to deal with - only they could be this deranged to pull this off. They aim to purge the world of things they deem evil - and make everything saccharine and cutesy.

So you decide to give these holiday horrors a good ol' taste of your festive fury. It's gonna be one special Christmas you won't forget! And you'll make it in time for It's A Wonderful Life and Sasha's special egg nog.

From the creator of Project Absentia comes a festive fresh take on an old cult classic. Do you dare enter this truck stop again?
